text: The Sammaditthi Sutta is part of the Middle Length Discourses.
He recited the Dhammapada verses to the assembly.
They studied the Satipatthana Sutta after the meal.
This passage is from the Anguttara Nikaya.
We compared the wording across the Samyutta Nikaya.
She referenced the Majjhima Nikaya commentary.
He quoted the Metta Sutta before the meditation.
The recitation of the Ratana Sutta began at dusk.
We discussed the Dhammacakkappavattana Sutta in detail.
They compiled notes on the Khuddaka Nikaya treatises.
Please read the Mahaparinibbana Sutta for homework.
We compared variants in the Devaduta Sutta.
